Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Mystical
Real Name: Wanda Maximoff
Special Powers
ALL-NEW HALLOWEEN SPOOKTACULAR!: Shape Change. When Wanda Maximoff uses it and succeeds, heal her 1 click.
PLEASE STAND BY: STOP.
BILLY, I NEED YOU TO FOCUS: Probability Control. When Wanda Maximoff uses it to reroll a friendly attack roll, if the attack hits, after resolutions remove an action token from the attacker.

Comments
June 19, 2022
Maxphyte
This figure is stupid good for normal games. I know they have been buffing defend figures in recent years to be better… but this might be taking it too far lol. It’s funny to me how much I used to love the Acolytes Colossus, but he quickly got overshadowed by Earth X Thing who is still great. Then we would get Invisible Woman figures that try to sprinkle balance with having defend combined with 19 or supporting powers. But now we have Wanda who is cheaper than a lot of the figures I talked about, has the 19 defense defend, has a version of prob control that is one of the best offensive versions of the power, has traited Shape Change that can allow her to heal, Mystics to act as another deterrent, oh and finally she has a STOP click. And yeah of course this figure put in work for my team earlier today lol.
June 13, 2022
Oathful
This Wanda is a very nice support piece for whatever team she's on. Typically I don't like to pay more than 35pts for my support units, but this Wanda offers a lot defensively for your team, as well as some Mind Control harassment when the situation arises. That on top of her traited Shape Change with heal is what really makes her appealing to me. Thematic: 10/10 Viability: 9/10 Fun Factor: 9/10, fairly balanced figure
June 9, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
This Wanda is good at staying alive, put a Carter's shield on her in conjunction with running the prime Carter and the extra plus 1 to defense at 19 increasing to 20 for some of my characters was huge. Also, the combination of Spider-Man the token popping out one and Wanda allows to one to keep off the stop clicks.
June 8, 2022
RascalJas
I'm gonna run her with Captain Carter's shield. Not for the effect, but cuz the movie...
June 7, 2022
Bobcat2022
Told ya so.
June 4, 2022
CaptainAmerica1945
I pulled those three pieces, gifted a first round bye because odd number of players and then won my two remaining matches. Sylvie was hit once, Wanda was hit several times but because of the shape change healed up, Strange didn't take any damage- I think my points were 700-0. I am impressed with all three pieces; in constructed I'm not sure about Strange especially at the 195 as the chase Wanda has two stop clicks for less points.
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
"It's the star of the show!" Someone in some Sealed is going to pull this gal, Strange Supreme, and Sylvie, and it's not even going to matter what else they pull. In Constructed she could be great to call in with Recruiter effects off any 50-point Avenger or Mystical piece that got KO'd, rejuvenating aching colleagues with a fresh defense value. Appreciate that mid/late-dial spike in Attack and Damage when she loses Mind Control, too.
May 3, 2022
Goop
I love me some 19defend with prob. She even has a little backup mind control to do in a pinch of the situation presents itself. Mystics long dial and a stop click means most wont want to deal with her early.
